header: This 19.7-second memory reel was designed to be a high-energy recap, but the final edit is heavily dictated by a library that lacks punch.

advisor.hero: The library is starving for energy and payoff shots, forcing me to lean on filler just to keep the clock ticking.
advisor.body: A scarcity of high-energy clips and a total lack of lifestyle motifs meant I had to prioritize rhythmic continuity over actual storytelling. I used structural anchors to hold the timeline together, but without better footage, the edit feels hollow.

friction_log: Started with high confidence using atmospheric and festive clips to set the stage.
Confidence wavered in the middle as I had to force structural anchors to maintain the rhythm.
Ended with high confidence in the recap, but only because I was leaning on filler to finish the duration.

post_mortem.worked: The technical sync is tight and the vintage LUT masks some of the library's energy issues.
post_mortem.didnt: The edit feels hollow because the library lacked payoff shots and lifestyle motifs.

next_steps: Capture lifestyle-specific footage to replace the forced structural anchors.
Record high-energy 'payoff' shots to break the low-energy cycle.
Diversify the library to reduce the heavy reliance on recap filler.
technical: Applied a vintage filmic LUT to create a cohesive visual thread across disparate clips.
Implemented syncopated pacing to keep the 19.7-second reel moving despite the lack of payoff shots.
